name: The Fridge Demo
description:
There's something in your fridge! 

Weird!!!

But also kind of . . . rad????

---

A short game about strategically moving items in your fridge to hide the secret in the back.

Features: 

  • revolutionary fridge-based gameplay 
  • original soundtrack
  • ~10 minutes per game
  • replayability 
  • chaotic energy 
  • a Karen

Goal: 

Spread the mold by moving items closer to moldy items. Get the highest mold count!

Controls: 

Use the mouse to move items. Click the post it note to advance to the next day. 

Demo: 

This demo features the basic core mechanics of the game. For the full version, we intend to expand on a wide range of features such as levels of difficulty based on randomly generated roommate personalities, story events, additional products, a money system, and more!
